item.title: 诺基亚牛气冲天，英伟达交易助推欧洲最新人工智能风潮
item.description: 诺基亚公司（Nokia Oyj）本周股价大涨，凸显出这家 5G 设备制造商和曾经的经典手机品牌如今正在成为欧洲人工智能领域的重要一员。【原文：This week’s big rally in Nokia Oyj shares underscores how the 5G equipment maker and once-iconic phone brand is now emerging as a major European artificial intelligence play.】

item.title: 期权交易商认为未来两个月 S&P 500 指数将步履维艰
item.description: 美国股市在今年再创辉煌，但从衍生品市场来看，可能已所剩无几。【原文：US equities have zoomed to another banner year, but going by the derivatives market, there may not be much left in the tank.】

item.title: 摩根大通AM认为供应过剩导致长债复兴
item.description: 摩根大通资产管理公司（JPMorgan Asset Management）称，随着各国政府和央行采取措施抑制长期债券市场的过剩，长期债券正变得更具吸引力。【原文：Long-dated bonds are looking more attractive as governments and central banks take steps to curb the glut in that segment of the market, according to JPMorgan Asset Management.】

item.title: 科威特养老基金巨头希望重返私募股权投资领域
item.description: 据熟知内情的人士透露，科威特养老基金在暂停私募股权投资后，正在重新启动私募股权投资分配，这有可能为这个正面临筹资低迷的行业释放数十亿美元的新资金。【原文：Kuwait’s pension fund is restarting private equity allocations after a hiatus, according to people familiar with the matter, potentially unleashing billions of dollars in fresh capital for an industry grappling with a fundraising slump.】

item.title: 出口和零售业强劲，香港经济增速创 2023 年以来新高
item.description: 由于出口回暖和消费复苏抵消了贸易紧张局势，香港经济在第三季度的增长速度远超预期，录得近两年来最强劲的增长。【原文：Hong Kong’s economy expanded much faster than forecast in the third quarter, posting the strongest growth in nearly two years as resilient exports and recovering consumption offset trade tensions.】

item.title: 卡扎克称欧洲央行不能对 2028 年通胀预测反应过度
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员马丁斯-卡扎克（Martins Kazaks）表示，欧洲中央银行必须谨慎解读 12 月份将收到的通胀预测，避免政策决定反复无常。【原文：The European Central Bank must be careful in interpreting the inflation projections it will receive in December and avoid erratic policy decisions, according to Governing Council member Martins Kazaks.】

item.title: 台湾经济借助人工智能热潮实现超预期增长
item.description: 台湾第三季度经济增长超过预期，为人工智能热潮带来的收益锦上添花。【原文：Taiwan’s economy grew more than expected in the third quarter, adding to its gains from the AI boom.】

item.title: 大众奥迪因激烈竞争和经济困境下调业绩展望
item.description: 由于 "激烈 "的竞争和包括美国关税在内的经济挑战，大众汽车公司的奥迪集团放弃了今年的财务目标。【原文：Volkswagen AG’s Audi Group walked back its financial targets for the year because of “intense” competition and economic challenges including tariffs in the US.】

item.title: 哈德逊河贸易公司如何使用人工智能
item.description:
人工智能在做市商环境中的意义。【原文：

What AI means in the market-making context.

】

item.title: 奇货可居：哈德逊河交易公司如何使用人工智能（播客）
item.description: 遗憾的是，似乎并不是只要登录 ChatGPT，让它推荐一些投资项目，就能获得很好的股票选择。然而，包括交易公司在内的各类金融公司都表示，他们正在越来越多地使用人工智能。但这些工具是否真正得到了应用？这些工具与传统的机器学习或算法交易方法有何不同？在本期播客中，我们将与 Ia【原文：Unfortunately, it doesn’t seem as though you can get great stock picks just by going to ChatGPT and asking it to recommend some investments. And yet financial firms of all sorts — including trading firms — say they’re increasingly using AI. But are the tools actually being deployed? And how do these tools differ from traditional machine learning or algorithmic approaches to trading, the likes of which have been used by quant firms for decades now. On this episode of the podcast, we speak with Ia】

item.title: 中加领导人自 2017 年以来首次会晤重启关系
item.description: 中国和加拿大领导人周五举行了八年来的首次正式会晤，两国希望重启因贸易和安全问题而紧张的关系。【原文：China’s and Canada’s leaders met on Friday for the first formal sitdown in eight years as the two nations look to reset ties strained over trade and security issues.】

item.title: 美国提出指控后，新加坡扣押了涉嫌诈骗的老板的资产
item.description: 新加坡扣押了超过 1.5 亿新元（1.15 亿美元）的资产，这些资产与柬埔寨企业集团 Prince Holding Group 及其创始人 Chen Zhi 涉嫌洗钱和造假有关。【原文：Singapore has seized more than S$150 million ($115 million) in assets linked to alleged money laundering and forgery in an operation involving Cambodian conglomerate Prince Holding Group and its founder Chen Zhi.】

item.title: 法国通胀进一步放缓，低于欧洲央行的能源和食品目标
item.description: 由于能源成本下降和食品价格上涨放缓，10 月份法国通胀进一步放缓，低于欧洲中央银行的目标。【原文：French inflation slowed further below the European Central Bank’s target in October as energy costs dropped and food-price increases eased.】

item.title: 阿布扎比王室公司寻求出售顶级开发商股权
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，阿布扎比一位有影响力的王室成员控制的一家公司计划通过出售其在该酋长国最大房地产开发商中的部分股份来筹集数亿美元资金。【原文：A company controlled by an influential Abu Dhabi royal plans to raise hundreds of millions of dollars by selling part of its stake in the emirate’s largest real estate developer, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 西班牙电信计划削减股息以与欧洲同行看齐
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，西班牙电信公司（Telefónica SA）将削减股息，作为下周发布的新战略计划的一部分。【原文：Telefónica SA is set to cut its dividend as part of a new strategy plan due next week, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: Erste 在波兰交易前资本缓冲增长更快
item.description: 埃尔斯特集团银行（Erste Group Bank AG）正在以比先前预期更快的速度建立资本缓冲，为其有史以来最大的一次收购提供资金。【原文：Erste Group Bank AG is building up its capital cushion more quickly than previously anticipated, helping it fund its largest ever acquisition.】

item.title: 金枪鱼罐头公司 "王子 "伦敦首次公开募股价格处于区间底部
item.description: 王子集团公司（Princes Group Plc）在伦敦的首次公开募股定价为市场定价范围的下限，这仍将是四年来英国最大的首次本地公司股票销售。【原文：Princes Group Plc priced its initial public offering in London at the bottom end of the marketed range, in what will still be the UK’s biggest first-time share sale for a local company in four years.】

item.title: 东京电子对人工智能乐观情绪发出警告，对前景持谨慎态度
item.description: 东京电子有限公司（Tokyo Electron Ltd.）上调年度预期的幅度低于预期，这表明在人工智能支出激增的背景下，出口管制和中国政府推动建立自己的芯片供应链的举措正在影响这家日本芯片设备制造商的前景。【原文：Tokyo Electron Ltd. raised its annual forecast by less than expected, a sign of how export controls and Beijing’s push to build its own chip supply chain are tempering the Japanese chip gear maker’s outlook amid an AI spending boom.】

item.title: 黄晓明称英伟达仍有希望向中国出售 Blackwell 芯片
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.公司首席执行官黄仁勋周五告诉记者，他仍然希望向中国客户销售公司 Blackwell 系列的芯片，尽管他目前还没有这样做的计划。【原文：Nvidia Corp. Chief Executive Officer Jensen Huang still hopes to sell chips from the company’s Blackwell lineup to customers in China, though he has no current plans to do so, he told reporters Friday.】

item.title: 拉脱维亚立法者投票决定退出《反对暴力侵害妇女条约
item.description: 在右翼政党的推动下，拉脱维亚议会投票决定退出一项打击暴力侵害妇女行为的国际公约，右翼政党声称该条约促进了波罗的海国家的女同性恋、男同性恋、双性恋和变性者的权利。【原文：Latvia’s parliament voted to exit an international convention that combats violence against women, in a push by right-wing parties which claim the treaty promotes LGBTQ rights in the Baltic nation.】

item.title: 印尼部长称印尼尚未接近购买中国战机
item.description: 印尼最高国防官员表示，印尼并不打算购买中国的歼-10战斗机，而此前印尼曾表示不打算购买中国的歼-10战斗机。【原文：Indonesia’s top defense official said the country is no closer to the purchase of Chinese J-10 fighter jets after previously signaling otherwise.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国股市将下跌，英镑下跌
欧洲央行行长科切尔称经济数据 "略有好转
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员马丁-科切尔（Martin Kocher）表示，近期的经济报告略有改善，未来两年的通胀率将保持在接近 2% 的水平。【原文：European Central Bank Governing Council member Martin Kocher said recent economic reports have improved a little and inflation is set to remain close to 2% for the next two years.】

item.title: 莫桑比克领导人表示将与道达尔能源公司谈判液化天然气成本上涨事宜
item.description: 莫桑比克总统丹尼尔-查波（Daniel Chapo）表示，东南非国家正在考虑道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies SE）提出的修改合同期限和批准增加液化天然气项目成本的建议。【原文：Mozambican President Daniel Chapo said the southeast African nation is considering a proposal by TotalEnergies SE to change the contract period and approve increased costs for its liquefied natural gas project.】

item.title: 英伟达与韩国最大企业达成人工智能协议
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）达成了一项具有里程碑意义的协议，为韩国最大的公司提供技术，这也是该公司积极推动在全球范围内扩展人工智能基础设施的举措之一。【原文：Nvidia Corp. forged a landmark deal to supply its technology to South Korea’s biggest companies, part of an aggressive push to expand AI infrastructure around the world.】

item.title: 有时我们会看到泡沫"，迈克尔-伯里警告零售交易商
item.description: 这位以做空美国房地产市场而成名的人向散户投资者发出了关于市场繁荣的隐晦警告。【原文：The man who made his name shorting the US housing market sent what appears to be a cryptic warning to retail investors about market exuberance.】

item.title: 南非汽车制造商陷入工资纠纷，可能发生罢工
item.description: 南非汽车制造商在周四晚些时候发表的一份声明中说，他们未能与该行业的工会--南非全国金属工人工会（Nation Union of Metalworkers of South Africa）达成工资协议。【原文：South Africa’s motor manufacturers failed to reach a wage agreement with the industry’s labor union, the Nation Union of Metalworkers of South Africa, it said in a statement late on Thursday.】

item.title: 外国人以七个月来最快速度抢购印度债券
item.description: 全球基金将以七个月来最快的速度增持印度债券，因为对降息的预期不断增强，从而提高了当地债务的吸引力。【原文：Global funds are set to boost their holdings of Indian bonds at the fastest pace in seven months, as growing expectations of interest-rate cuts boost the appeal of local debt.】

item.title: 印度顶级太阳能出口商调整供应链以绕过美国关税
item.description: 印度顶级太阳能电池板制造商Waaree Energies Ltd.表示，该公司正在重新配置其供应链，试图绕过高昂的美国进口关税，继续向占其订单近60%的美国供货。【原文：India’s top solar panel maker Waaree Energies Ltd. said it’s reconfiguring its supply chain in an attempt to get around steep US import tariffs and keep supplying to a country that accounts for nearly 60% of its orders.】

item.title: 亲欧盟领导人赢得大选，荷兰将诞生最年轻总理
item.description: 自由党 D66 的领导人罗布-耶滕（Rob Jetten）有可能成为下一任荷兰首相，他与极右翼自由党领导人、反移民的分裂性立法者盖尔特-威尔德斯（Geert Wilders）形成了鲜明对比。【原文：In more than one way, Rob Jetten, the head of the liberal D66 party who might become the next Dutch prime minister, offers a stark contrast to Geert Wilders, the divisive anti-migrant lawmaker who heads the far-right Freedom Party.】
